TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Popup extends System.Windows.FrameworkElement implements class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
Public Class Popup Inherits FrameworkElement Implements IAddChild
public ref class Popup : System::Windows::FrameworkElement, System::Windows::Markup::IAddChild
type Popup = class inherit FrameworkElement interface IAddChild

summary.span: 表示包含內容的快顯視窗。

span.span: Represents a pop-up window that has content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **內容模型**:有一個內容屬性： 。**Content Model**: has one content property: . A一個子系，它可以是任何最多可以有。A can have a maximum of one child, which can be any . 如下圖所示控制項，其做為其父系。The following illustration shows a control that has a as its parent. ![Popup 圖例](~/add/media/popuppicture.JPG "快顯功能表圖")![Popup illustration](~/add/media/popuppicture.JPG "Popup illustration") 您可以藉由設定定位快顯， ， ， ，和屬性。You can position a popup by setting the , , , , and properties. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[快顯放置行為](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). 當會顯示在畫面上，它不會因為其父代重新調整位置。When is displayed on the screen, it does not reposition itself if its parent is repositioned. A在它自己的視窗在螢幕上顯示其內容。A displays its content in its own window on the screen. A控制項支援動畫時屬性設定為`true`和應用程式以完全信任執行。A control supports animation when the property is set to `true` and the application is running with full trust. 執行以完全信任的應用程式具有完整存取權的系統資源，通常會安裝在使用者的系統。An application that is running with full trust has complete access to system resources and is typically installed on the user's system. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 安全性 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Security (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md). 出現在內容的點陣圖和不透明度的效果，您必須在上直接設定效果內容。For bitmap and opacity effects to appear on the content of a , you must set the effects directly on the content. 內容不會繼承所設定的效果控制項或任何其他項目，是在父視窗中。The content of a does not inherit effects that are set on the control or on any other element that is in the parent window. A預設大小為其內容。A is sized to its content by default. 當發生這種情況，套用或點陣圖效果可能會導致至會被遮蔽。When this occurs, applying a or bitmap effects may cause the to be obscured. 這是因為內容的預設大小不會提供足夠的顯示效果的區域。This occurs because the default size of the content does not provide enough area for the effects to display. 如果需要更多空間，您可以定義周圍的邊界內容增加是控制項可用的區域。If more space is required, you can define a margin around the content to increase the area that is available to the control. 屬性必須設定時用於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfxwebapp-md.md)]。The property must be set on the when used in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfxwebapp-md.md)]. 若要建立工具提示，請使用和類別。To create a tooltip, use the and classes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [ToolTip 概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/tooltip-overview.md)。For more information, see [ToolTip Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/tooltip-overview.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立控制項。The following example shows how to create a control. [!code-xaml[PopupSimple#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSimple/CSharp/Window1.xaml#2)] [!code-csharp[PopupSimple#CreatePopup](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSimple/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#createpopup)] [!code-vb[PopupSimple#CreatePopup](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSimple/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#createpopup)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowsTransparency { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AllowsTransparency : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 控制項是否可以包含透明的內容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a control can contain transparent content.

value.span: 如果 控制項可以包含透明的內容，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the control can contain transparent content; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項只可以包含透明的內容，當應用程式以完全信任。A control can only contain transparent content when the application runs with full trust. 以完全信任執行的應用程式具有完整存取權的系統資源，通常會安裝在本機系統。An application that runs with full trust has complete access to system resources and is typically installed on the local system. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 安全性 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Security (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md). 這個屬性不能設定為`true`時裝載於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfxwebapp-md.md)]。This property cannot be set to `true` when the is hosted in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfxwebapp-md.md)]. 如果屬性設定為`true`不會執行完全信任的應用程式中屬性值變更為`false`。If the property is set to `true` in an application that does not run in full trust, the property value is changed to `false`. 在瀏覽器裝載的應用程式是不會在完全信任中執行的應用程式的範例。An application that is hosted in a browser is an example of an application that does not run in full trust. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性上的控制項。The following example shows how to set the property on a control. [!code-csharp[PopupSnips#AllowsTransparency](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/Csharp/Window1.xaml.cs#allowstransparency)] [!code-vb[PopupSnips#AllowsTransparency](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#allowstransparency)] [!code-xaml[PopupSnips#AllowsTransparency](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/Csharp/Window1.xaml#allowstransparency)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項的內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the content of the control.

value.span: 控制項的 內容。

span.span: The content of the control.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks **內容模型**:屬性是只包含內容屬性控制項。**Content Model**: The property is the only content property for the control. A只能有一個因為子系，但子系可以包含複雜的內嵌的內容。A can only have one as a child, but that child can contain complex embedded content. 比方說，可以是子系，其中包含，文字和其他類型的控制項。For example, the child can be a that contains an , text, and other types of controls. 當將內容新增至控制項，就會在控制項內容的邏輯父代。When content is added to a control, the control becomes the logical parent to the content. 同樣地，內容會被視為邏輯的子系。Similarly, the content is considered to be the logical child of the . 子內容不會加入至視覺化樹狀結構，其中包含控制項。The child content is not added to the visual tree that contains the control. 相反地，具有它自己的視覺效果的另一個視窗中轉譯子內容樹狀結構的時機設為`true`。Instead, the child content is rendered in a separate window with its own visual tree when the is set to `true`. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將內容加入至控制項。The following example shows how to add content to a control. summary.span: 將子項目附加至 控制項。

span.span: Attaches a child element to a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可能想要建立自訂控制項，其中擁有與現有的控制項相同的功能，而且也會表現的行為。You might want to create a custom control that has the same functionality as an existing control and also exhibits the behavior of a . 您可以讓您的控制項行為類似加上至您的控制項，呼叫方法。You can make your control behave like a by adding a to your control and calling the method. 這個方法會指派`child`子屬性並將下列屬性以繫結`child`。This method assigns `child` to the child property and binds the following properties to `child`. - - - - - - - - 您應該實作這些自訂相依性屬性，所以您可能會在控制項中的使用的相同方式來。You should implement these as dependency properties in your control so it can be used the same way as a . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[自訂相依性屬性](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/custom-dependency-properties.md)。For more information, see [Custom Dependency Properties](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/custom-dependency-properties.md). 當您呼叫，`child`不可為的子系。When you call , `child` cannot be a child of a . 此外，`PlacementTarget`之前呼叫這個方法時，您應該設定您的控制項。Also, `PlacementTarget` should be set on your control before you call this method.

summary.span: 取得或設定目標原點與快顯功能表對齊點之間的水平距離。

span.span: Get or sets the horizontal distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.

value.span: 目標原點與快顯畫面 (Popup) 對齊點之間的水平距離。

span.span: The horizontal distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.

value.span: 目標原點和快顯對齊點的相關資訊，請參閱[快顯放置行為](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。

span.span: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).

value.span: 預設值為 0。

span.span: The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以藉由設定定位快顯， ， ， ，和屬性。You can position a popup by setting the , , , , and properties. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[快顯放置行為](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `double` 字串表示值。A string representation of a value. 這會解譯為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]度量。This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement. 字串就不需要明確包含小數位數。Strings do not have to explicitly include decimal points. 例如，值`1`是可以接受的。For example, a value of `1` is acceptable. 相同範圍限制與本主題的屬性值一節中所述。The same range restrictions apply as those that are mentioned in the Property Value section of this topic. `qualifiedDouble` A`double`值，這個資料表中，稍早所述後面接著一個的下列單位宣告字串： `px`， `in`， `cm`，或`pt`。A `double` value as described earlier in this table, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, or `pt`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1 中 = 96px`in` is inches; 1in=96px `cm` 是公釐。1cm=(96/2.54) 像素`cm` is centimeters; 1cm=(96/2.54) px `pt` 為點;1pt=(96/72) 像素`pt` is points; 1pt=(96/72) px ## Examples 下列範例會建立，並設定和屬性為 20。The following example creates a and sets the and properties to 20. 屬性設定為（此為預設值），因此目標原點會是目標區域的左下的角，而且快顯對齊點的左上的角。The property is set to (which is the default), so the target origin is the bottom left corner of the target area and the popup alignment point is the top left corner of the . [!code-xaml[PopupPositionSnippet#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupPositionSnippet/CS/Window1.xaml#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您將內容加入至控制項，就會在控制項內容的邏輯父代。When you add content to a control, the control becomes the logical parent to the content. 同樣地，內容會被視為邏輯的子系。Similarly, the content is considered to be the logical child of the . 子內容不會加入至視覺化樹狀結構，其中包含控制項。The child content is not added to the visual tree that contains the control. 相反地，在不同的視窗有它自己的視覺效果呈現的子內容樹狀結構的時機屬性設定為`true`。Instead, the child content is rendered in a separate window that has its own visual tree when the property is set to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法一律會傳回具有寬度和高度為零 (0)，因為邏輯父代的視覺化樹狀結構在找不到內容或是。This method always returns a that has a width and height of zero (0), because content is not located in the visual tree of its logical parent or . 不同的視窗具有自己視覺化樹狀結構中建立的子內容。The child content is created in a different window that has its own visual tree.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Controls::Primitives::PlacementMode Placement { System::Windows::Controls::Primitives::PlacementMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Controls::Primitives::PlacementMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項開啟時的方向，以及指定當 控制項與畫面邊界重疊時的行為。

span.span: Gets or sets the orientation of the control when the control opens, and specifies the behavior of the control when it overlaps screen boundaries.

value.span: 列舉值，決定 控制項開啟時的方向，以及指定控制項與畫面互動時的行為。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the orientation of the control when the control opens, and that specifies how the control interacts with screen boundaries.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以藉由設定定位快顯， ， ， ，和屬性。You can position a popup by setting the , , , , and properties. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[快顯放置行為](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). 如果屬性是`true`，將要或反轉的位置;具有設為對齊其左邊的緣與邊緣並具有設為對齊左邊緣與右邊緣。If the property is `true`, setting to or reverses the position of the ; a with set to aligns its left edge with the right edge of and a with set to aligns its right edge with the left edge of . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會建立四個相對於映像的控制項。The following example creates four controls that are relative to an image. 每個有不同的位置屬性的值。Each has a different value for the placement property. remarks.format: ## Remarks A才可以動畫顯示的時機屬性設定為`true`。A can only animate when the property is set to `true`. 這需要建立的應用程式控制項以完全信任執行。This requires the application that creates the control to run with full trust. 如果以動畫顯示，不具有動畫效果。If the is animated, the will not be animated. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool StaysOpen { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.StaysOpen : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 控制項失去焦點時是否關閉。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control closes when the control is no longer in focus.

value.span: 如果 控制項在 屬性設定為 時關閉，則為 。如果 控制項在滑鼠或鍵盤事件於 控制項外發生時關閉，則為 。

span.span: if the control closes when property is set to ; if the control closes when a mouse or keyboard event occurs outside the control.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`true`，保持開啟，直到它明確關閉藉由設定屬性設`false`。When the property is set to `true`, stays open until it is explicitly closed by setting the property to `false`. 當是`false`，則控制會攔截所有的滑鼠和鍵盤事件來判斷上述其中一個事件發生外部控制項。When is `false`, the control intercepts all mouse and keyboard events to determine when one of these events occurs outside the control. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[PopupSnips#StaysOpen](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/Csharp/Window1.xaml.cs#staysopen)] [!code-vb[PopupSnips#StaysOpen](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#staysopen)] [!code-xaml[PopupSnips#StaysOpen](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/Csharp/Window1.xaml#staysopen)]

member this.VerticalOffset : double with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定目標原點與快顯功能表對齊點之間的垂直距離。

span.span: Gets or sets the vertical distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.

value.span: 目標原點與快顯功能表 (Popup) 對齊點之間的垂直距離。

span.span: The vertical distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.

value.span: 目標原點和快顯對齊點的相關資訊，請參閱[快顯放置行為](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。

span.span: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).

value.span: 預設值為 0。

span.span: The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以藉由設定定位快顯， ， ， ，和屬性。You can position a popup by setting the , , , , and properties. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[快顯放置行為](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `double` 字串表示值。A string representation of a value. 這會解譯為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]度量。This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement. 字串就不需要明確包含小數位數。Strings do not have to explicitly include decimal points. 例如，值`1`是可以接受的。For example, a value of `1` is acceptable. 相同範圍限制與本主題的屬性值一節中所述。The same range restrictions apply as those that are mentioned in the Property Value section of this topic. `qualifiedDouble` A`double`值，這個資料表中，稍早所述後面接著一個的下列單位宣告字串： `px`， `in`， `cm`，或`pt`。A `double` value as described earlier in this table, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, or `pt`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1 中 = 96px`in` is inches; 1in=96px `cm` 是公釐。1cm=(96/2.54) 像素`cm` is centimeters; 1cm=(96/2.54) px `pt` 為點;1pt=(96/72) 像素`pt` is points; 1pt=(96/72) px ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會建立，並設定和屬性為 20。The following example creates a and sets the and properties to 20. 屬性設定為（此為預設值），因此目標原點會是目標區域的左下的角，而且快顯對齊點的左上的角。The property is set to (which is the default), so the target origin is the bottom left corner of the target area, and the popup alignment point is the top left corner of the . [!code-xaml[PopupPositionSnippet#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupPositionSnippet/CS/Window1.xaml#5)]
